title: Cyber_Purok
description: on-going virtual 3d environment featuring 3d assets from Salawaki and Low Bandwidth Dreams projects. The goal is to create a MOBA-inspired virtual environment.

title: Power Plant
description: a project by Luyo_Space, a zine documenting local medicinal plants. Currently the Luyo_Space artists are entering the data on excel sheet and we can view the progress on the website.

title: Error 405: Panawagan Cannot Be Fulfilled
description: viideo documentation of the Error 405: Panawagan Banner project by Gab Ferrer .

title: Yellow Basket
description: A project by Franco Mamaril . A satire of contemporary e-commerce platforms.

title: DropCall
description: send a 2-sec voice message and will be broadcasted to GhostWhispers installation. A project by Roan Alvarez and KoloWn, currently installed also in Thailand Benniale 2025.

title: Aninipot
description: builds by Roan Alvarez and Rhaz Oriente, will lit up if receives a data from dropcall
